story_21_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Whew! I guess we can wrap up our daily
training there. What do you think, Conkeldurr?
story_21_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I know. The real problem is figuring out what
will happen now...
story_21_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
We came to Pasio to train and take our martial
arts to new heights—to find our new path.
story_21_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
But nothing has changed. We are the same
as we were back in Unova. We have to do 
something different.
story_21_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
That’s it, Machamp!
Now, give me ten thousand more Karate Chops!
story_21_03000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Ah, Marshal!
I did not realize you were on Pasio, too.
story_21_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Yes. I was actually just looking for a good spot
to train. Is that what you and Machamp are
doing here?
story_21_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Indeed, we are. There are many boulders here,
which makes it perfect for training.
story_21_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I see. It looks like it’s going well. I could hear your
battle shouts from way over there! They resonated
deep within me.
story_21_03000/2401_1001_1700_10: I’ve never heard such intense shouts before.
story_21_03000/2401_1001_1800_10: Oh, you could hear my battle shouts?
story_21_03000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Whenever I try to exert myself to the fullest,
that sort of shout naturally comes out.
story_21_03000/2401_1001_2000_10:
It’s the same with Machamp. The more we shout
from our cores, the more strength we can muster!
story_21_03000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Here we go, Machamp! Show us your superior 
power... No, your overwhelming power!
story_21_03000/2401_1001_2300_10:
You do have a good shout...
But you gotta have balance, too.
story_21_03000/2401_1001_2400_10: Ah, Brawly... Have you finished surfing?
story_21_03000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Yeah, those were some rad waves!
Hariyama had tons of fun, too!
story_21_03000/2401_1001_2600_10: Oh hey, Marshal! You training here, too?
story_21_03000/2401_1001_2700_10: Wait! Marshal, are you and Conkeldurr—
story_21_03000/2401_1001_3000_10:
Your upper bodies are definitely impressive.
Your muscles make it obvious that you’ve got an
intense training regimen.
story_21_03000/2401_1001_3100_10:
But your lower body can still use some
improvement. If you train your legs, your lower
half’ll be totally gnarly in no time, too!
story_21_03000/2401_1001_3200_10: Wha—?! You could tell that in a single glance?
story_21_03000/2401_1001_3300_10:
Brawly’s Pokémon Gym is filled with exercise
machines for Trainers and Pokémon to use.
He would know a thing or two about muscles.
story_21_03000/2401_1001_3400_10:
I might have a different methodology than Bruno,
but I train and work out as well.
story_21_03000/2401_1001_3500_10:
Oh! If you want a good way to train your lower
body, I’d recommend surfing!
story_21_03000/2401_1001_3700_10:
Haha! You never know...
You two might be good at it!
story_21_03000/2401_1001_4000_10: Surfing is a bit extreme, don’t you think, Brawly?
story_21_03000/2401_1001_4300_10:
New encounters! New perspectives! They’ll lead to
new doors...and maybe a new path!
story_21_03000/2401_1001_4400_10:
Bruno, Brawly! How would you like to do even
more intense training with me?
story_21_03000/2401_1001_4500_10:
We can form a team—and aim for the top of the
PML as the ultimate Fighting-type team!
story_21_03000/2401_1001_4600_10:
Let’s continue on our path to becoming masters
of martial arts together!
